attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to cancel VAT altogether in every sphere that charges VAT. It is immoral and a burden on those of us who are on low wages, are struggling to make ends meet.
"Why should there be a  Tax of this type?" when we already pay for goods and then there is VAT added literally stealing money from us and shockingly at the behest of the government, the very people we put into power to look after our interests.
